features: 🎤CARDIOID DYNAMIC Karaoke MICROPHONE-Wired microphone with cord for karaoke features a cardioid pickup pattern for greater gain while simultaneously minimizing feedback. The plug in microphone, music stuff, is ideal for live situations where noise cancellation is needed, which makes the handheld DJ microphone corded remarkable for presentation, wedding, conference, church, interview and solo performances stage.

🎤 FLAT, WIDE-RANGE FREQUENCY-The smooth frequency range is solid at 50 to 18 kHz. The 1/4’’ microphone karaoke is suited well for handling high sound pressure levels. 1/4'' plug in microphone is tailored for spoken word, various instruments like acoustic guitar. Having no power requirement makes dynamic microphone for singing the ideal choice for any live applications.

🎤 OPTIMAL SPEECH INTELLIGIBILITY-Such karaoke microphone system for adults, the vocal microphone wired delivers an low distortion for clean sound output, precise reproduction of speech and vocals with excellent intelligibility. The dynamic vocal microphone with cable is suitable for recreational activities, such as singing, karaoke, home party and performance, indoors or outdoors.

🎤A XLR TO 1/4” CABLE INCLUDED-Allowing the wired microphone for karaoke to be directly plug in amplifier speaker or karaoke machine that has 1/4inch (6.35mm) mic in jack. The dynamic vocal microphone protected by two-tire PVC, and it’s thick enough for brilliant, transparent sound transmission with no loss. The corded microphone with 14.8ft-long enough cable can be moved unimpeded so you can concentrate on nothing but the performance.

🎤 RUGGED AND RELIABLE METAL CONSTRUCTION-The karaoke microphone set for singing that is robust, simpler to operate with suitable size and shape for your hands, being a better option for public speaking. Built-in pop filter for protection against plosives. An external on/off switch on it for easy control of audio.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: -Durability Dynamic Karaoke Microphone Rugged and reliable plug in microphone for singing and acoustic guitar. It is very sturdy and can tolerate comparatively rough handling. -Broadcast Quality Wired Dynamic Microphone Coming with upgraded mic capsule, articulate and accurate vocal reproduction can be reflected and cut through any mix. -Handy On/Off Switch External on/off key can be used more easily when vocal singing. -Recommended Applications Handheld dynamic microphone is ideal for broadcast and solo singing vocals, drums, and amplified guitars. Also a great electronic item for gifts. -Cardioid Capsule Design Handheld Microphone for Karaoke 1/4'' corded karaoke microphone for adults helps efficiently isolate your voice from other on-stage sounds, ensuring plenty of gain before feedback. -Wired Handheld Microphone with 14.8ft Cable The 1/4’’ plug protected by metal material for enhanced durability. 14.8ft-long enough to move unimpeded to concentrate on nothing but the singing performance. -Widely Compatibility The wired microphone for karaoke can be directly plug in amplifier, speaker, mixer or karaoke machine that has 1/4inch (6.35mm) mic in jack. -Warm Tips The DJ Microphone is NOT compatible with ECOXGEAR EcoBoulder+, ION Pathfinder 280, ION Pathfinder 4, and small speakers lower than 15 watt, such as JBL charge, Doss touch, Bose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well and quality
reviews.reviewText: Got this for a speaker box for meetings... works really well and clear quality sound

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great sound, great price. Nice length cord wise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Totally worth it. No compromises at a great price.
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for karaoke parties and I would 100% buy it again. The mic is sturdy (if not a bit heavy) and the cable feels primo. I like that I can detach it and swap for a longer one, if need be. The on/off switch is made of chintzy plastic and has a bit of play to it - if anything ever breaks, it'll be the switch...but regardless, the mic on the whole feels very sturdy so may not ever be an issue.In my opinion, it sounds good enough to use for professional needs, like DJ and MC, possibly podcasting with the right mixer and sound engineer. The pickups are excellent, even from the sides (though they are noticeably quieter than speaking directly into the top of the mic) and do a good job filtering out background noise.10/10, would mic again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good product for the price
reviews.reviewText: Really good quality! I tried it for a little bit and I loved it . Happy costumer. I just wish it can turn wireless

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Replacement and Upgrade
reviews.reviewText: Bought my 9 year old a boom box w/ a microphone. The Microphone broke within a week. He was sad as it appeared he had not abused the mic. I bought this microphone for him and a month later, it is still working great. No Problems and even sounds better than the stock one we replaced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Picks up great!
reviews.reviewText: This mic replaces the Ion brand mic (1of2) that came with our Ion karaoke speaker from Costco. It actually picks up better that the Ion one too. Ion wanted $60 for their replacement one so this is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did not work great with my karaoke machine
reviews.reviewText: My karaoke machine is not top-of-the-line, but it isn't a child's piece of junk either. The microphone that came with it just stopped working one day, so I ordered this one. The cord is REALLY long -- didn't measure it, but I'm guessing maybe 20 feet. It's so long that if you stretched it all the way out you could not see the words of the song on the screen. But that's a minor issue. The real issue is the sound quality, which, for me, was awful. Again, it may be a problem with my machine, although I did not have that problem previously, and do not have that problem now with the wireless microphone I bought to replace this one. I'm not saying it's a bad product, just that it did not work well for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great. Good value.
reviews.reviewText: Microphone fit speaker perfectly. Sound is way better and a good value. Would definitely order again.
Não entendo de microfones, mas comprei para minha esposa brincar de karaoke e o som dele é bem interessante. A construção é sólida, todo de metal, com cabo grosso, aparentando ser boa qualidade.
I really surprised with the quality and performance in this rangeHighly recommend

reviews.reviewTitle: Quite good quality Mike for home Karoakey
reviews.reviewText: I just got this and tested with my existing speaker which offer 6.5mm audio jack port, easily got connected and sound is quite better than my wireless mike which came along with Karaoke machine. Overall its good purchase, you will not feel bad.
It is able to plug on for immediate use on my current set. The sound is acceptable and i am happy
